com.solvvy.cluster

Class ClusterBuilder<T extends Scoreable<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solvvy.cluster.ClusterBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of elements being clustered

    public class ClusterBuilder<T extends Scoreable<T>>
extends Object
    A helper class to build a Cluster of elements.

    Primary responsibilities are performing stage 2 classification and generating cluster keywords.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClusterBuilder

        public ClusterBuilder(org.apache.mahout.math.Vector featVecCentroid,
                      FeatureSetClassifier<?> stage2Classifier,
                      java.util.function.IntFunction<Optional<String>> indexToFeatureMapper,
                      ClusterFeaturizerFunction<T> featuresOfCluster,
                      Cluster.Id clusterId)
        Construct a ClusterBuilder
        Parameters:
        featVecCentroid - the centroid of the cluster to build
        stage2Classifier - a classifier for assigning stage2 scores to elements
        indexToFeatureMapper - a function that returns the feature names stored at the given indices in a clustered feature vector
        featuresOfCluster - a function that returns a featurizer that generates features of the cluster being built.
        clusterId - the id to give the cluster being built

        stage2Classifier - a classifier for assigning stage2 scores to elements
        indexToFeatureMapper - a function that returns the feature names stored at the given indices in a clustered feature vector
        featuresOfCluster - a function that returns a featurizer that generates features of the cluster being built.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(FeatureVectorWithSource<T> featureVector)
        Add an element to the cluster builder.
        Parameters:
        featureVector - the feature vector containing the element to add to the cluster.
        Returns:
        true if the element was successfully added; false otherwise.

      • buildTips

        public Optional<Cluster<T>> buildTips(int maxClusterSize,
                                      Optional<java.util.function.Predicate<ClusteredFeatureVector<T>>> filter)
        Construct a cluster of tips from the elements added to the ClusterBuilder
        Parameters:
        maxClusterSize - the size of the largest cluster of elements produced by clustering.
        filter - a predicate used to filter out undesirable elements, such as low-scoring ones.
        Returns:
        a cluster containing the filtered elements; None if all elements are filtered.

      • buildStepwise

        public Cluster<T> buildStepwise(int maxClusterSize)
        Construct a cluster of steps from the elements added to the ClusterBuilder
        Parameters:
        maxClusterSize - the size of the largest cluster of elements produced by clustering.
        Returns:
        a cluster representing a stepwise solution

      • build

        public Optional<Cluster<T>> build(int maxClusterSize,
                                  Optional<java.util.function.Predicate<ClusteredFeatureVector<T>>> filter,
                                  ClusterCreationFunction<T> create)
        Construct a cluster from the elements added to the ClusterBuilder, optionally filtering out some elements from the final cluster. The elements will only be scored if a filter is provided.
        Parameters:
        maxClusterSize - the size of the largest cluster of elements produced by clustering.
        filter - a predicate used to filter out undesirable elements, such as low-scoring ones.
        create - a function that creates a cluster from an id, elements, and keywords
        Returns:
        a cluster containing the filtered elements; None if all elements are filtered.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of elements contained by the ClusterBuilder.
        Returns:
        the number of elements contained by the ClusterBuilder.

      • clusterVector

        public ClusteredFeatureVector<T> clusterVector(FeatureVectorWithSource<T> featureVector)
        Produce a clustered feature vector from a feature vector, containing the feature vector and a double representing its distance from the cluster centroid.
        Parameters:
        featureVector - the feature vector to produce a clustered feature vector from
        Returns:
        a clustered feature vector from the given feature vector

      • getVecDistance

        public double getVecDistance(org.apache.mahout.math.Vector v)
        Get the distance from the given vector to the cluster centroid.

        v - the vector to compute distance from the centroid
        Returns:

      • getVectorCluster

        public Optional<VectorCluster<T>> getVectorCluster()
        Get the vector cluster representing the contained elements;
        Returns:
        the vector cluster representing the contained elements, if any elements are contained in the ClusterBuilder; if no elements are contained, returns None.
